resource_value: minimum 250,000 oz Au @ at least 0.75 g/t (0.5 g/t cut-off)
source_sentence: Albion declaring under the JORC Code a minimum 250,000 ounce contained gold inferred, indicated and/or measured Mineral Resource with a grade of at least 0.75 g/t (and cut-off grade of at least 0.5 g/t)
resource_context: Performance Rights Milestone - JORC Compliant - Inferred, Indicated and/or Measured Mineral Resource
